variable.label: Primary Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Short, Primary or 2-digit address, CV 1, range 1-127

variable.label: Start voltage
variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at Speed Step 1, range 0(default)-255, CV5
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.label: Accel 1 Rate
variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default)-255, CV3

variable.label: Decel 1 Rate
variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default)-255, CV4

variable.label: Maximum Voltage
variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at top throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255, CV5
variable.comment: Range 0-255, A value of 255 corresponds to 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.label: Midpoint Voltage
variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at midrange throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255, CV5
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.label: Version ID
variable.tooltip: CV7=41-46 for all TCS with Back EMF models, Read Only

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: CV8=153 for TCS, Read Only

variable.label: BEMF Cut Out
variable.tooltip: turn off BEMF above this speed step, range 0(default-128), CV10

variable.label: Decoder Lock control number
variable.tooltip: To unlock a decoder make CV15=0 or CV15=CV16

variable.label: Decoder Lock ID number
variable.tooltip: Set this decoder's locking ID number, range 1-6, default 1, CV16

variable.label: Long Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended (4 digit) address, range 128-9999, mapped to CV17 and 18

variable.label: Consist Direction
variable.tooltip: CV19, This loco runs Normal(default) or Reversed(address+128) when in the consist

variable.label: Consist Address Active For White
variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward

variable.label: Consist Address Active For Yellow
variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse

variable.label: Consist Acceleration Adjustment
variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment

variable.label: Consist Deceleration Adjustment
variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment

variable.label: Analog conversion mode
variable.tooltip: CV29, '4' bit. Allows the loco to run on DC, default is Off

variable.label: Dither Frequency
variable.tooltip: Range 1 (high) to 10 (low)

variable.label: Dither Amplitude
variable.tooltip: Practical range is 5 (low) to 50 (high)

variable.label: BEMF Enable
variable.tooltip: Turn off/on(default) BEMF, CV61 least bit, enabling BEMF disables Dither

variable.label: Enable BEMF Button Control
variable.tooltip: Disable(default)/Enable button control of BEMF, CV61 '2' bit

variable.label: Enable Brake Button Control
variable.tooltip: Disable(default)/Enable button control of Brake, CV61 '3' bit

variable.label: Motor Button Control
variable.tooltip: Motor controlled by Function button

variable.label: Button Control Direction
variable.tooltip: If motor button control is active, CV61

variable.label: Momentary Pulse
variable.tooltip: 1 second = 60 to 4 seconds = 255

variable.label: Ditch Light Blink Holdover Time
variable.tooltip: 1 second = about 12

variable.label: Dimming Brightness
variable.tooltip: 16 = 50% for incandescent bulbs, 2-6 for LEDs
